attributes.action: Build an East Coast motorway across the Wash
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lincolnshires single carriageway roads are for the vast majority not adequate to carry the quantity of heavy goods traffic and people are dieing needlessly in overtaking accidents due to the ridiculous 40mph HGV speed limit. We either need an East coast Motorway or make the A17/A47 from Newark to Norwich dual carriageway. ANY new roads built in Lincolnshire should be dual carriageway not single (ie, Crowland A1073 bypass).
